content: {"locationId": "9938", "organizationId": "8028", "name": "Love Kenova Food Pantry", "address1": "1616 Poplar St", "address2": "", "city": "Kenova", "state": "WV", "zipCode": "25530", "country": null, "phone": "304-908-1034", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "38.40092", "longitude": "-82.58105", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Wayne", "languages": "English", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The #LoveKenova Food Pantry is located at New Beginnings Church of God. ", "notes": "The #LoveKenova Food Pantry suggests neighbors to bring a box or laundry basket to store in your trunk or bring one with you so your items can easily be loaded into your vehicle. ", "contactName": "Bob and Romy Ingels", "contactPhone": "304-908-1034", "contactEmail": "bobingels@nbchog.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "CSFP Program, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Other, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Other, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 69, "regionName": "Facing Hunger Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "d6cdcac7-64e3-45cc-9c4f-b501fa20b650.png", "website": "https://facinghunger.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Friday 1:00 PM-3:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
